Perplexity AI Review 2026

AI-Powered Search Engine with Citations

What is Perplexity AI?

Perplexity AI is an AI-powered search engine that combines the conversational abilities of ChatGPT with real-time web search and citations. It provides accurate, up-to-date information with sources.
